name: Pacsim
overview: A Pac-Man clone by Marcus (Mark) Whitehead, published as freeware in 1989. It has been a part of many PD compilations such as the Assassins, where it was listed as one of the top 10 Assassins games and released as ASI Games volume 102 along with Fruit Salad and Rebound and the Amiga charityware collection called Now That's What I Call Games Disk.
